summary: INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKETS LEAKING ANTI-FREEZE.  MANY TRUCKS ARE EXPERIENCING THIS SAME PROBLEM.  MY TRUCK HAS 74000 MILES AND I KNOW OF 2 OTHERS W/ 78,000 AND 66,000 MILES THAT NEEDED GASKET REPLACEMENT.  TALKING TO A DEALER EMPLOYEE REVEALED THAT IT IS A POPULAR PROBLEM WITH THE CHAVY VORTEC MOTORS.  AT A COST OF AROUND $400.00, IT IS A TOO FREQUENT PROBLEM.  THANK YOU.    *NLM
